base_description: White globe with a stand, spherical shape.
part_description: Consists of a spherical globe and a circular base. The globe is mounted on top of the base, which is flat and round, providing stability.
internal_interaction_description: The globe is attached to the base via a small axis allowing it to rotate. This axis is secured to the base, enabling smooth movement of the globe around its axis while supported by the base.
external_interaction_description: The globe can be spun manually to view different areas. It serves as an educational tool or decorative item, often interacted with by students or individuals seeking geographical information.
